name: Armaldia
introduce: Armaldia is a fantasy metaverse play-to-earn game based on the BNB chain . The universe of Armaldia is multiple and diversified: it is composed of 198k revenue generating land plots that can be purchased as NFT. Armaldia has two types of insolite plots and visual themes: a wild land and a tech land. The game permits to own land, construct buildings, produce resources, buy, sell and trade. But still the main attraction is an interactive structured war between two conflicting factions — Hitech and Wild Magic.
